content.raw:
I'd love to use the latest version but you have told how to install it !!!  You are providing teams with lots of linux and ROS experience with a big advantage. Are you looking to reward good system administrator or robotics programming?

either provide a new deb release that can be installed witht eh setup instructions or provide a similar compile/build install instructions for the 3 plugin fixes.
